ygData.subject: Re: Rhesus
ygData.msgSnippet: Where did Mustex get information about Veratis? Megaton didn t say anything and knowledge about his existence has been limited to a few words about his agenda

Where did Mustex get information about Veratis? Megaton didn't say anything
and knowledge about his existence has been limited to a few words about his
agenda dureing a fight at the Cybertronian fire. Since landing Veratis
hasn't left the area that his ship landed in.
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2001 3:48 PM
Subject: Rhesus


> Rhesus stood,pearly white,at a head shorter than Rattrap. He was
> poised with his only weapon, a reflective staff. The 2 small cannons
> fired and he deflected both shots. Then his incredible senses
> detected a slight soundless shift in the metal beneath his feet. He
> quickly turned,hurled the staff at the source,and jumped away from the
> next 2 beams. He then stared astonished as Mustex caught the staff in
> mid flight.
> Rhesus:Computer,deactivate firing pattern. You've improved.
> Mustex:Shutup. I'm here to ask for your help. I need to find the
> Mutants. I need Veratis to pinpoint how Stallex started as a baby and
> worked his way up to this age. With Veratis' access to protoforms
> maybe I can force him to create dozens of new Maximal babies.
> Rhesus:No.
> Mustex:Come on. You weren't always a piece of slime. Do you remember
> why you
> carry that staff.
> Rhesus:No.
> Mustex:Well I do, because you have to much honor to carry a blaster.
> Rhesus:Go away.
> Mustex:Fine then! Maybe my best friend died with the other Carnitrons.
> Rhesus:I always told you times change.
> Mustex:Finish your own quote, but warriors never do!
>
>  I have no intentions of vastly using Rhesus. He's just another Trump
> card
> for Mustex(the first being Stallex). He'll probably just jump out from
> behind a boulder and save Mustex or Stallex's circuits.
>
>
>
>
